column4:
1) Click on the 'Brand' tab in the main menu.
2) Click on the 'Add Brand' button.
3) Enter name of the brand in the 'Brand Name' text field. 
4) Click on the 'Brand Category' drop down.
5) Select any one category from the list.  
6) Click on the 'Save Brand' button.

1) Click on the 'Brand' tab in the main menu.
2) Hover over any one disabled brand from the list.
3) Click on the 'Status' toggle button to enable the brand.
4) Click on the 'Yes' button in the dialog box.

1) Click on the 'Brand' tab in the main menu.
2) Hover over any one enabled brand from the list.
3) Click on the 'Status' toggle button to disable the brand.
4) Click on the 'Yes' button in the dialog box.

1) Click on the 'Campaigns' tab in the main menu.
2) Click on the 'Add Campaign' button in the top right section of page.
3) Enter name of the campaign in the 'Campaign Name' text field. 
4) Click on 'Brand' drop down. 
5) Select any one brand from the drop down list.
6) Click and select the campaign start date using the 'Start Date' calendar.
7) Click and select the campaign end date using the 'End Date' calendar.
8) Select campaign schedule opertating hours.
9) Click to expand PlanX/ Publisher/ Proximity/ Screen resolutions/ Category/ Gender/ Age ratio/ Locations, and select as per your requirement.
10) Click on the Enable Blockchain toggle to either enable or disable blockchain logs.
11) Click on the 'Add Campaign' button.

1) Click on the 'Campaigns' tab in the main menu.
2) Click to open any one paused campaign.
3) Click on the 'Status' toggle button to enable/resume the campaign.
4) Click on the 'Yes' button in the dialog box.

1) Click on the 'Campaigns' tab in the main menu.
2) Click to open any one active campaign.
3) Click on the 'Status' toggle button to disable/pause the campaign.
4) Click on the 'Yes' button in the dialog box.

1) Click on the 'Campaigns' tab in the main menu.
2) Click to open any one active campaign.
3) Click on the 'Add Creative' button in the top right section of page.
4) Click and select the campaign start date using the 'Start Date' calendar.
5) Click and select the campaign end date using the 'End Date' calendar.
6) Select campaign schedule opertating hours.
7) Click to expand Screen resolutions/ Category/ Locations, and select as per your requirement.
8) Click on the 'Upload Image or Video' secton.
9) Browse local storage and select image or video to add as advertisement.
10) Click on the 'Add Creative' button.

1) Click on the 'Campaigns' tab in the main menu.
2) Click to open any one active campaign with paused creative.
3) Click on the 'Creatives' tab.
4) Click to open any one paused creative.
5) Click on the 'Status' toggle button to enable/resume the creative.
6) Click on the 'Yes' button in the dialog box.

1) Click on the 'Campaigns' tab in the main menu.
2) Click to open any one active campaign with paused creative.
3) Click on the 'Creatives' tab.
4) Click to open any one paused creative.
5) Click on the 'Status' toggle button to enable/resume the creative.
6) Click on the 'Yes' button in the dialog box.

1) Click on the 'PlanX Ai' tab in the main menu.
2) Click on the 'Create New Plan' button.
3) Enter Plan name in the 'PlanX Name' text field.
4) Select a brand from the 'Brand' drop down.
5) Click to expand Publisher/ Proximity/ Screen resolutions/ Category/ Gender/ Age ratio/ Locations, and select as per your requirement.
6) Click on the 'Save Plan' button.

1) Click on 'PlanX Ai' tab in the main menu.
2) Click on 'Proximity' button.
3) Click on 'Create New Proximity' button in the top right section of page.
4) Click on 'Proxmity name' field and enter proximity name. 
5) Click on search bar.
6) Enter a proximity in search bar. 
7) Click on search button(maginfiying glass button).
8) Add/Remove locations with searched proximity locations.
9) Select proximity radius using 'Radius covered' slider. 
10) Click on 'Save' to save proximity.
11) Click on 'Create' button.

1) Click on 'PlanX Ai' tab in the main menu.
2) Click on 'Proximity' button.
3) Hover over any one proximity from the list.
4) Click on the 'Edit' button.
5) Make changes as per your requirement.
6) Click on the 'Update' button to save changes.

1) Click on 'PlanX Ai' tab in the main menu.
2) Click on 'Proximity' button.
3) Hover over any one proximity from the list.
4) Click on the 'Delete' button.
5) Click on the 'Yes' button in the dialog box.
